SOOO CAYENNE FIR/UIR EMBD TS FCST WI N0230 W05430 - N0315 W05415 -
N0500 W05430 - N0530 W05400 - N0400 W05130 - N0215 W05245 TOP FL420
STNR NC==

WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 4...FROM 60NW PQI-PQI-HUL-BGR-PVD-HTO-JFK-SYR-60N 
SYR-MSS-30SSE YSC-50E YSC-60NW PQI 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==
